name: Hello small world (a.k.a "Sad game")
description:
My very first "hello world" type of game, written in haxe & flixel, and coincidentally sad

It was sorta started as a preparation for one of the upcoming ludum dares of the past, but never became what it should be; instead of this it rather reflected my depression state of the time

All copyright to the music belonges to Juha Kujanpää (demoscene alias Dizzy/CNCD, Finland), the track was boldly grabbed from the Assembly 2002 list of compo entries; Literature excerpt is taken from the Sartre's masterpiece Nausea
